actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: Recognizing the significance of the 45th anniversary of Kwanzaa Week.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Recognizes the significance of the 45th anniversary of Kwanzaa Week (December 26 - January 1). Commends Dr. Maulana Karenga for his scholarship, creativity, commitment, and vision in creating this holiday and introducing the Nguzo Saba as a core value system which contributes to community development and the enrichment of national and human values and culture.

titles.title: Recognizing the significance of the 45th anniversary of Kwanzaa Week.
